item.description:
http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=193317824067691 This month Liberty Drinks travels to Somerville to engage in political hijinks. Come and celebrate election season with our favorite political drinking games! We'll be playing "Name that federal agency", "Who got the bailout?" and the timeless "Who said it? Bush or Obama". Winners will receive $20 of Federal Reserve Notes in PDF file format*, that you can take home and print to create your own economic stimulus!

Just doin' our ... part for freedom ya'll.

*To download and print a PDF file, you will need to have the Adobe Acrobat Reader software installed. You can download the latest version of Adobe Acrobat Reader FREE from Adobe's Web site.

Text Liberty to 64274 to sign up for our SMS reminder service!

Venue: Foundry on Elm
Davis Square - 255 Elm Street, Somerville, MA
Directions: http://www.foundryonelm.com/directions/index.html
Getting there: Located right in the heart of Davis Square Somerville, across from Joshua Tree and adjacent to The Burren. Steps from Red Line Davis Square T stop. Street parking is limited but meters are available along Highland Avenue in particular.

As always, see the hostess if you have any problem finding us, call or text me (Andreas) at 617-398-7402
item.name: Liberty Drinks Boston: all your votes are belong to us drinkfest!
